article: Yesterday afternoon I went back home and found the door to my house had been opened. The house had not been broken into because the _ had been safely undone and placed on the roof of the kennel where we normally put it. On the door mat was a pair of shoes _ to my wife and this made me believe that it was she who had _ the door. This was _ because she is always the one coming home45 _ in the evening from work. Being a banker, the nature of her job _ her to stay out till around 7:30 in the evening. I entered the house and _ directly to the bedroom where I thought she was. I thought she was. I found she had covered her face with a blanket when I entered the _ , and she became quite emotional and started weeping _ . Itried to ask her what was wrong, but she couldn't _ it. I guessed that maybe she had been _ that one of her s was dead. I sat her down on the bed and brought her a glass of waster to help her cool down. When she had calmed down, she told me, "I am fed up with my job. Some clients _ for loans two weeks ago and I was _ with ensuring that the processing the loans was completed. The bank had delayed processing the loans and some customers have been _ me and insulting me on the phone and on social media. The bank administrators have been very _ to respond to the applications and I feel that this is a(n) _ ." I looked at her keenly and told her, "Darling, if you want to shed tears because of what people say or think about you, then you tears will fill barrels before you die. Our _ won't help in finishing your enemies but will help them in finishing you. The pain of being _ might sometimes be strong, but still, it costs us _ to forget and move on."
